subject: OEM Licensing Guidelines
body:
A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.

If God had an agent, the world wouldn't be built yet. It'd only be about Thursday.

To bear other people's afflictions, everyone has courage and enough to spare.

Every society honors its live conformists and its dead troublemakers.


Politeness is the slow poison of collaboration.

Love is a friendship caught on fire.

More powerful than the will to win is the courage to begin.

He talked on for ever and you wished him to talk on for ever.

Because I could not stop for death, He kindly stopped for me The carriage held but just ourselves and immortality.

You must be in fashion is the utterance of weak headed mortals.

Just think of the tragedy of teaching children not to doubt.

Sir, a man may be so much of everything, that he is nothing of anything.

The real people of genius were resolute workers not idle dreamers.
